p: In Brazil, the first autochthonous cases of CHIKV were confirmed in September 2014 in the municipality of Oiapoque, Amap√° state in the North of Brazil, followed by the city of Feira de Santana (FS), Bahia state in Northeast region, around seven days later [ 6]. By that time genomic analysis have identified the East/Central/South/Africa (ECSA) genotype for the first time in the Americas in FS and the municipality stood out in national scenario due to the large number of reported cases of the disease [ 6, 7].
